headline: CoreSite Launches NY3 Data Center, Expanding AI-Optimized Capacity in the New York Metro Area
summary: DENVER, September 25, 2025--CoreSite, an American Tower company (NYSE: AMT) empowering critical business and AI workloads that impact everyday life through interconnected data center solutions, today announced the completion of its newest facility, NY3. Located in Secaucus, New Jersey, and part of the New York metropolitan area, this purpose-built data center adds more than 138,000 square feet to CoreSite’s New York footprint. The asset is strategically positioned adjacent to CoreSite’s existing

headline: American Tower Remains An Attractive, Low-Risk Play
summary: American Tower stock remains a strong investment with rising revenues, solid guidance, and financial flexibility. Here's what investors need to know.
